price: Igihe abimonogoje mu bugarariji binjiye mu muriro, bazotanako umwikomo, maze babwirane hagati yabo bati: “Ng’uwo umugwi w’abantu isinzi, utegerezwa kwinjirana na mwe mu muriro udaheraˮ. Abari muri uwo muriro bazobishura bati: “Ntibagahabwe ikaze, ntibakagire uburaro n’uburamuko mu muriro, ni ukuri nibinjire mu muriro baheze bawote nkatweˮ;
arabic: هَٰذَا فَوۡجٞ مُّقۡتَحِمٞ مَّعَكُمۡ لَا مَرۡحَبَۢا بِهِمۡۚ إِنَّهُمۡ صَالُواْ ٱلنَّارِ

meta.transliteration: hādhā fawjun muq'taḥimun maʿakum lā marḥaban bihim innahum ṣālū al-nāri
